channel.title: Keeping On - Geovanni [WIP, Project, Collab?]
channel.description:
Hey producers:
The name of this song I have is called “keeping up,” but I’m having a good problem trying to bring it to life. I made these sounds and sequences all random and in this track I was looking to deviate this particular song between hiphop and disco.
I was going for a song like Tyler The Creators “I think” or Kanye Wests “Stronger”
You can add and edit and remove sounds as you'd like! Thank you! Geovanni.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/jJxzbpJwlxJahQGzA5Jisw==

item.title: Keeping On - Geovanni [WIP, Project, Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Fuujiya
item.description:
Cool dude & yeah it does sounds very rnb like slowed lol

Read full topic

item.title: Keeping On - Geovanni [WIP, Project, Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Geovannitheson
item.description:
Thank you for replying and sharing your idea and Ooh man this sounds very cutting edge. It does reside in a disco/house type of light with a side of pop. When I slowed it down to 100-110bpm, it really transported me to writing rnb lyrics. When I set it back to its original tempo, it became a classic dance track. I like it a lot and I’ll see what I can do with it.

Read full topic
